casebody.data:
ARCHON CORPORATION; Paul W. Lowden; and Suzanne Lowden, Petitioners,
v.
The EIGHTH JUDICIAL DISTRICT COURT of the State of Nevada, IN AND FOR the COUNTY OF CLARK; and the Honorable Mark R. Denton, District Judge, Respondents,
and
Dan Raider, Real Party in Interest. No. 74270 Supreme Court of Nevada. FILED MAY 24, 2019

DENIED.
